name: Space Blaster (SleepyAbby2000)
description:
This is my 2D Shooter project, there is an issue within leveling up throughout the game, I'm planning on having this fixed before the final project

Modifications Idea List: 1) New soundtrack for main menu and levels. 2) I want to attempt to create a new enemy that can represent my idea for a redone theme. 3) New background/ scenery. 

All scripts and assets created by Brian Winn
